greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if (2*phi(n)) < n, 0 otherwise, where phi is Euler totient function (A000010).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
xref: Cf. A000010, A054741, A083254, A318875 (Inverse Möbius transform).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 05 2019
